verses.name: Job 28:12
verses.text: But where shall wisdom be found? and where is the place of understanding?

verses.name: Job 28:13
verses.text: Man knoweth not the price thereof; neither is it found in the land of the living.

verses.name: Job 28:14
verses.text: The depth saith, It is not in me: and the sea saith, It is not with me.

verses.name: Job 28:15
verses.text: It cannot be gotten for gold, neither shall silver be weighed for the price thereof.

verses.name: Job 28:16
verses.text: It cannot be valued with the gold of Ophir, with the precious onyx, or the sapphire.

verses.name: Job 28:17
verses.text: The gold and the crystal cannot equal it: and the exchange of it shall not be for jewels of fine gold.
